original_text: This is when God will punish Israel's people. Then all the things will happen that his servants wrote about in the Bible.
korean_text: 이 날들은 기록된 모든 것을 이루는 징벌의 날이니라

sentences.original_text: This is when God will punish Israel's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님이 이스라엘 백성을 벌하실 때입니다.

sentences.original_text: Then all the things will happen
that his servants wrote about in the Bible.
